alert.note: Alert for La Sal and Abajo Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 1:10AM MST until November 29 at 9:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 7500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected above 7500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, bringing total snow accumulations to 6 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...La Sal Mountains. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Icy to snow packed roadways and drifting snow will create hazardous driving conditions. Visibility will be greatly reduced in blowing snow. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
